oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee postcard by Garrett Foust
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color drawing by Garrett Foust depicting a farmer and his son carrying buckets towards a barn. "Farmers" is written on the bottom left corner of the postcard. This postcard is part of the Tennessee Bicentennial Mall State Park 1st Edition Children's Art Series. Features a divided back, narrative, and a semi-transparent logo for the state park on reverse. [No. 327610]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drawings; Farmers
